data.name: Yerr Out
data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the game of baseball, Yerr Out is a barnstormin' good time out on the ballfield. Choose from 30 different animals to assemble your team. Each character has different attributes which are categorized by STRENGTH, SPEED, AGILITY, TECHNIQUE

Controls are responsive and easy to learn. Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays.

But don't expect all the same rules as traditional baseball. In this game, there is no need for foul balls or tagging up. Put the ball in play and see what unfolds! Lots of opportunities for aggressive baserunning and slick fielding. And of course, intense pitcher vs batter matchups



Future features plan to have:

  • multiple fields to play at
  • 12+ unlockable characters
  • animal teammate chemistry
  • more stats/record keeping
  • postgame MVPs and boxscore
  • homerun derby, practice mode
  • spectator mode (for online matches)

data.short_description: Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays. Choose from 30 different animals to assemble your team, each with different attributes categorized by STRENGTH, SPEED, AGILITY, TECHNIQUE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
